button.reignofnether.villager_faction: Join the game as the Villager Faction.
button.reignofnether.villager_spawn: Spawns 3 villagers at the target location.
button.reignofnether.monster_faction: Join the game as the Monster Faction.
button.reignofnether.monster_spawn: Spawns 3 zombie villagers at the target location.
button.reignofnether.piglin_faction: Join the game as the Piglin Faction.
button.reignofnether.piglin_spawn: Spawns 3 piglin grunts at the target location.
ability.cooldown.message: This ability is still on cooldown
control.group.label: Control Group %s (Right click to remove)
building.reignofnether.dark_watchtower.d: An ominous tower that can garrison units.
Garrisoned ranged units have increased range.
building.reignofnether.dark_watchtower.m: Can hold a maximum of %s units
building.reignofnether.dungeon.name: Dungeon
building.reignofnether.dungeon.descripti: A fiery cage containing the power to create creepers.
building.reignofnether.graveyard.name: Graveyard
building.reignofnether.graveyard.descrip: A field of the dead that can raise Zombies and Skeletons.
building.reignofnether.haunted_house.des: A spooky house that provides population supply.
building.reignofnether.laboratory.name: Laboratory
building.reignofnether.laboratory.descri: A sinister lab that can research new technologies
based on the other buildings that have been built.
building.reignofnether.mausoleum.name: Mausoleum
building.reignofnether.mausoleum.descrip: A tomb of the dead that produces zombie villagers.
Distorts time to midnight within a %s block radius.
building.reignofnether.mausoleum.limit: You may only have one capitol building at any time.
building.reignofnether.pumpkin_farm.name: Pumpkin Farm
building.reignofnether.pumpkin_farm.desc: A pumpkin field that can be harvested to collect food.
Pumpkins don't need to be replanted but farms cost more up front.
building.reignofnether.sculk_catalyst.de: A pillar which spreads sculk when nearby units die.
Distorts time to midnight within a %s block radius.
Nearby sculk extends this range up to %s blocks and
building.reignofnether.spider_lair.name: Spider Lair
building.reignofnether.spider_lair.descr: A silken cave to grow spiders, both large and poisonous.
building.reignofnether.spruce_bridge.des: A bridge built to traverse water.
Must be connected to land or another bridge.
Can be built over lava (but isn't fireproof!)
Bridges can be repaired or attacked by anyone.
Storage for units and players to drop off resources.
building.reignofnether.stronghold.name: Stronghold
building.reignofnether.stronghold.descri: A villainous stronghold that can produce wardens.
Distorts time to midnight within a %s block radius.
building.reignofnether.stronghold.requir: Requires a Graveyard, Spider Lair, and Dungeon.
building.reignofnether.bastion.name: Bastion
building.reignofnether.bastion.descripti: A fortified barracks to house military piglins,
enabling them to be produced at military portals.
building.reignofnether.blackstone_bridge: A bridge built to traverse water or lava.
Must be connected to land or another bridge.
Bridges can be repaired or attacked by anyone.
building.reignofnether.central_portal.de: The primary portal to transport piglin grunts from the nether.
building.reignofnether.central_portal.li: You may only have one capitol building at any time.
building.reignofnether.flame_sanctuary.d: Scorching pillars of lava and brick to keep blazes,
enabling their production at military portals.
building.reignofnether.fortress.name: Fortress
building.reignofnether.fortress.descript: An imposing nether fortress that allows military portals
to produce ghasts and garrisons up to %s units.
building.reignofnether.fortress.requirem: Requires a Flame Sanctuary and a Wither Shrine.
building.reignofnether.hoglin_stables.de: A shelter to keep Hoglins stabled in the overworld,
enabling their production at military portals.
building.reignofnether.netherwart_farm.d: A field of netherwart that can be farmed to collect food.
Workers automatically use wood to replant while working.
building.reignofnether.portal.name: Portal
building.reignofnether.portal.descriptio: An obsidian portal used to spread nether blocks.
Can be upgraded for various different functions.
Can be built on overworld terrain, but at half speed.
building.reignofnether.wither_shrine.des: A dark shrine dedicated to the power of Withers.
Enables wither skeleton production at military portals.
building.reignofnether.arcane_tower.name: Arcane Tower
building.reignofnether.arcane_tower.desc: A magical tower that is home to Witches and Evokers.
building.reignofnether.barracks.name: Barracks
building.reignofnether.barracks.descript: A training ground for Pillagers and Vindicators.
building.reignofnether.blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
building.reignofnether.blacksmith.descri: A smithy to forge military upgrades and iron golems.
building.reignofnether.castle.name: Castle
building.reignofnether.castle.descriptio: A grand castle that can produce ravagers
building.reignofnether.castle.requiremen: Requires a Blacksmith, Arcane Tower and a Barracks.
building.reignofnether.iron_golem_buildi: An Iron Golem that can be built in the field.
building.reignofnether.library.name: Library
building.reignofnether.library.descripti: An enchanting table surrounded by pillars of books.
building.reignofnether.oak_stockpile.des: Storage for units and players to drop off resources.
building.reignofnether.town_centre.name: Town Centre
building.reignofnether.town_centre.descr: A gazebo at the centre of your village that produces villagers.
building.reignofnether.town_centre.limit: You may only have one capitol building at any time.
building.reignofnether.villager_house.de: A simple house that provides population supply.
building.reignofnether.watchtower.name: Watchtower
building.reignofnether.watchtower.descri: A fortified tower that can garrison units.
Garrisoned ranged units have increased range.
building.reignofnether.watchtower.capaci: Can hold a maximum of %s units.
building.reignofnether.wheat_farm.name: Wheat Farm
building.reignofnether.wheat_farm.descri: A wheat field that can be tilled to collect food.
Workers automatically use wood to replant seeds while working.
hud.reignofnether.creeper_prod.name: Creeper
hud.reignofnether.creeper_prod.descripti: An explosive monster that can blow up units and buildings.
hud.reignofnether.creeper_prod.capitol_d: Deals less damage to capitol buildings.
hud.reignofnether.creeper_prod.sunlight_: Creepers move much more slowly under sunlight.
hud.reignofnether.drowned_prod.name: Drowned
hud.reignofnether.drowned_prod.descripti: An infectious variant of the zombie which zombifies
villagers and piglins after killing them.
hud.reignofnether.drowned_prod.requires_: Requires an upgrade at the Laboratory.
hud.reignofnether.husk_prod.name: Husk
hud.reignofnether.husk_prod.description: A hardy variant of the zombie with tougher skin.
hud.reignofnether.husk_prod.sunlight_res: Husks DO NOT burn under sunlight.
hud.reignofnether.husk_prod.requires_upg: Requires an upgrade at the Laboratory.
hud.reignofnether.poison_spider_prod.des: A spider fanged with deadly poison.
hud.reignofnether.poison_spider_prod.sun: Spiders move much more slowly under sunlight.
hud.reignofnether.poison_spider_prod.req: Requires an upgrade at the Laboratory.
hud.reignofnether.skeleton_prod.name: Skeleton
hud.reignofnether.skeleton_prod.descript: An undead soldier with a bow and arrows.
hud.reignofnether.spider_prod.name: Spider
hud.reignofnether.spider_prod.descriptio: A giant spider that is nimble but frail.
hud.reignofnether.spider_prod.skeleton_u: Can be upgraded to allow skeletons to ride them.
hud.reignofnether.spider_prod.sunlight_s: Spiders move much more slowly under sunlight.
hud.reignofnether.stray_prod.name: Stray
hud.reignofnether.stray_prod.description: An chilling variant of the skeleton that fires slowing arrows.
hud.reignofnether.stray_prod.requires_up: Requires an upgrade at the Laboratory.
hud.reignofnether.warden_prod.name: Warden
hud.reignofnether.warden_prod.descriptio: A powerful but blind monster that can fire sonic booms.
hud.reignofnether.zombie_prod.name: Zombie
hud.reignofnether.zombie_prod.descriptio: An undead monster with a basic melee attack.
hud.reignofnether.zombie_villager_prod.d: An undead worker that can construct and
hud.reignofnether.zombie_villager_prod.s: Zombie villagers DO NOT burn under sunlight.
hud.reignofnether.blaze_prod.name: Blaze
hud.reignofnether.blaze_prod.description: A fiery elemental that shoots fireballs from afar.
Attacks are fast and ignite enemies but inaccurate.
hud.reignofnether.brute_prod.name: Brute
hud.reignofnether.brute_prod.description: A piglin armed with a sword for combat.
hud.reignofnether.ghast_prod.name: Ghast
hud.reignofnether.ghast_prod.description: A massive flying creature that fires explosive fireballs
from a great distance to siege units and buildings.
Slow and fragile, but can only be targeted by ranged units.
hud.reignofnether.grunt_prod.name: Grunt
hud.reignofnether.grunt_prod.description: A piglin worker that can construct and
hud.reignofnether.headhunter_prod.name: Headhunter
hud.reignofnether.headhunter_prod.descri: A piglin that throws tridents in battle.
hud.reignofnether.hoglin_prod.name: Hoglin
hud.reignofnether.hoglin_prod.descriptio: A beast trained for war. Deals 50% more damage to buildings.
Can be upgraded to be mountable by Headhunters.
hud.reignofnether.wither_skeleton_prod.d: A charcoal black skeleton that afflicts
wither on enemies and deals bonus damage
(up to double) to enemies near death.
hud.reignofnether.evoker_prod.name: Evoker
hud.reignofnether.evoker_prod.descriptio: A learned wizard that can cast combat spells.
hud.reignofnether.iron_golem_prod.name: Iron Golem
hud.reignofnether.iron_golem_prod.descri: A slow hulking golem of metal with a powerful melee.
attack that deals double damage to buildings.
hud.reignofnether.pillager_prod.name: Pillager
hud.reignofnether.pillager_prod.descript: A villager armed with a crossbow for ranged combat.
hud.reignofnether.ravager_prod.name: Ravager
hud.reignofnether.ravager_prod.descripti: An enormous beast that can smash through hordes of enemies.
They can roar to knockback enemies and be mounted by pillagers.
hud.reignofnether.villager_prod.name: Villager
hud.reignofnether.villager_prod.descript: A worker that can construct and repair
hud.reignofnether.vindicator_prod.name: Vindicator
hud.reignofnether.vindicator_prod.descri: A villager armed with an axe for melee combat.
hud.reignofnether.witch_prod.name: Witch
hud.reignofnether.witch_prod.description: A devious hag who can heal and harm with potions.
ability.reignofnether.call_lightning.des: Summon a bolt of lightning at the target location.
Can be used to charge creepers and damage enemies.
ability.reignofnether.summon_vexes.descr: After a long delay, summon {0} flying vexes that attack
the evoker's target. Vexes start to die off after {0} seconds.
ability.reignofnether.connect_portal.des: Connect to a transport portal you own anywhere else.
Overrides any existing connections on both sides.
ability.reignofnether.fire_wall_shot.des: Fire an accurate shot that ignites all blocks in a line.
While this is on cooldown, the blaze cannot attack.
ability.reignofnether.promote_illager.de: Promote an illager to a captain, giving it a banner that gives
a speed buff to all friendly units in a {0} block radius.
You may only have one captain at a time per upgraded castle.
ability.reignofnether.roar.description1: Emit a deafening roar, knocking away, damaging
ability.reignofnether.roar.description2: and briefly slowing down all nearby enemies.
ability.reignofnether.evoker_fangs_circu: Have this evoker summon a circle of snapping
Have this evoker summon a long line of snapping
fangs around the caster when attacking.
ability.reignofnether.sonic_boom.descrip: After a short delay, fire a targeted wave of sound at the
target, dealing heavy damage and knocking it far away.
ability.reignofnether.potion_harming.des: Throw a potion that deals instant damage to units.
ability.reignofnether.lingering_harming_: Throw a potion that leaves a cloud of deadly gas.
ability.reignofnether.lingering_regen_po: Throw a potion that leaves a cloud of healing vapours.
ability.reignofnether.regen_potion.descr: Throw a potion that restores health to units over time.
ability.reignofnether.shield_stance.desc: Raise or lower a shield - reducing projectile
damage taken by 67% and movement speed by 50%.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_adv: Allows portals to be constructed on overworld terrain at full speed
and enables them to be upgraded into transport portals, which can instantly teleport units between them.
Provides strategic movement capabilities across the map.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_dro: Transforms all of your zombies into drowned, which
zombify Villager and Piglin units after killing them.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_evo: Unlocks the ability for evokers to summon vexes.
Requires evokers to have been unlocked.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_lab: Adds a lightning rod to this lab that can be activated
to call lightning to charge creepers and damage enemies.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_poi: Transforms your Spiders into Cave Spiders, granting them
researchitems.reignofnether.research_por: Converts into a transport portal, allowing for instant
teleportation of units to another linked transport portal.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_scu: Wardens can Sonic Boom Sculk Calaysts to split the boom onto
3 random nearby enemies within a range of SPLIT_BOOM_RANGE.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_sil: Gives your buildings a {0}% chance to spawn a silverfish
whenever a block is destroyed.Silverfish have
researchitems.reignofnether.research_spi: Unlocks the ability for skeletons to mount spiders.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_str: Transforms all of your skeletons into strays
researchitems.reignofnether.research_bla: Allows Blazes to fire a single shot that ignites all
blocks in a line, but disables their attacks temporarily.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_bru: Allows Brutes to raise a shield to reduce projectile damage taken by 67%
researchitems.reignofnether.research_cas: Upgrades this castle to be able to promote an illager unit to a captain,
providing a speed aura to friendly units.
Each upgraded castle may only support one captain at a time.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_fir: Your units become immune to fire tick damage and magma.
Standing directly in fire or lava still causes damage.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_gol: Allows villagers to construct iron golems.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_hea: Headhunters' tridents knock enemies back on hit.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_hog: Unlocks the ability for headhunters to mount hoglins.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_lin: Doubles the duration of witches' potion clouds.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_pil: Enchants the crossbows of all pillagers with multishot.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_por: Converts into a civilian portal, supplying 15 population
and allowing workers to drop resources off here.
Converts into a military portal, allowing production
of military units based on the buildings you own.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_rav: Unlocks the ability for pillagers to mount ravagers,
gaining explosive arrows that shoot upwards like mortar.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_res: Raises the resource capacity of workers from 100 to 200.
Workers still auto-return resources when holding above 50.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_vin: Upgrades the axes of all vindicators to diamond (+2 damage).
researchitems.reignofnether.research_wit: Enemies killed by wither skeletons leave
behind a deadly cloud of wither on death.
researchitems.reignofnether.research_hus: Transforms all of your zombies into husks, granting them
